001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.controller;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.model.entity.User;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.service.AbstractUserService;
005import java.util.UUID;
006import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
007import org.springframework.http.MediaType;
008import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;
009import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PathVariable;
010import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PutMapping;
011import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
012import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
013import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;
014
015@RestController
016@RequestMapping("/users")
017public class UserController {
018
019  private final AbstractUserService userService;
020
021  @Autowired
022  public UserController(AbstractUserService userService) {
023    this.userService = userService;
024  }
025
026  @GetMapping(path = "/me", produces = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE)
027  public User get() {
028    return userService.getCurrent();
029  }
030
031  @PutMapping(path = "/me",
032      consumes = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE, produces = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE)
033  public User put(@RequestBody User user) {
034    return userService.update(user);
035  }
036
037  @GetMapping(path = "/{externalKey}", produces = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE)
038  public User get(@PathVariable UUID externalKey) {
039    return userService.get(externalKey);
040  }
041
042}
